page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT IN LAINDON
page.content: We did a survey to find out where the parents of the children in our school work.Only a few actually work in Laindon. Many people who live in Laindon work in{London.} They{commute to London everyday by train. People also find work on the industrial sites in{Basildon. The main areas of{employment}in Laindon are the shopping centre and the new industrial site at {Southfields.}One of the new factories is Gordon's Gin factory. It is one of the largest bottling factories in England. The advantage of the new industrial site is that it will provide jobs. However it is noisy and dirty and there are not many jobs for young people.
